Philip Klein , a writer at the conservative American Spectator, explains the appeal for Mike Pence . There are a few factors driving talk of a Mike Pence presidential run. A regular speaker at tea parties, Mike Pence is one of a small number of elected Republicans with an appeal to economic, social and national security conservatives, he writes.
